img_above_text:
![Wukong Fright 3.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/d/df/Wukong_Fright_3.jpg)
At the foot of the large archway stands another new enemy, the Spearbone. These warriors with horse skull heads adorned with brambles are very durable enemies, and will roar before stabbing and slashing with their hefty spears. Since they are slow to hit, engage in light attack combos and watch their moments to know when to dodge or try a strike through.
img_below_text:
As you enter the Fright Cliff proper, another Pitstone enemy waits up the path, with a Blazebone enemy on a ledge to the right to try and pepper you with projectiles.
![Wukong Fright 5.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/86/Wukong_Fright_5.jpg)
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.

        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Fright 3.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/d/df/Wukong_Fright_3.jpg)

Since they are slow to hit, engage in light attack combos and watch their moments to know when to dodge or try a strike through."
        - Following Text: "As you enter the Fright Cliff proper, another Pitstone enemy waits up the path, with a Blazebone enemy on a ledge to the right to try and pepper you with projectiles.
![Wukong Fright 5.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/86/Wukong_Fright_5.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game *Black Myth: Wukong*, showing the player character navigating a rocky, dry terrain with sparse vegetation. Two enemies can be seen in the distance: one on the ground and another on a ledge, suggesting an upcoming encounter. The HUD displays the player's health, abilities, and inventory, with "Aged Ginseng x1" recently acquired, indicating resource collection. This moment appears to set up a strategic combat scenario as the player progresses through the Fright Cliff area.
